about_the_game:
Buy and sell weapons

Purchase a variety of weapons from the blacksmith and furniture from the carpenter to display them. Sell your goods to adventurers eager to embark on epic quests.

Upgrade and customize your shop

Expand your shop by purchasing upgrades, giving you more space for furniture and adding a backroom to store excess inventory.

Unlock new equipment

Earn experience with every sale to increase your reputation level and gain points to spend in a skill tree, unlocking new weapons and items to sell.

Customize your clientele

Want a shop for warriors only? Go for it. Prefer rangers? Sure! How about warriors and mages, but no rangers? You can do that too! With our satisfaction system, the more items you sell to a specific class, the more likely you’ll attract similar customers.

Your feedback matters

Encountered a bug? Got an idea to improve the game? Something not to your liking? Join our Discord or leave a comment on Steam to share your thoughts.

Please note: while we can’t implement every idea, we’ll read all feedback and take every message into consideration.

Use of AI-Generated Art

We only use AI generated art for the Steam page. No assets in the game were generated using AI. All game assets were either free to use or purchased.

short_description: Dive into a medieval fantasy world as a shopkeeper providing tools for brave adventurers embarking on their quests. Buy and sell weapons, upgrade and customize your shop, optimize your space, unlock new gear, and more. After all, behind every hero stands a master shopkeeper.
